name: Development
text: I build fun-to-use web and mobile applications considering appropriate packages and technologies of the javascript/react ecosystem.

name: Business-driven Operating
text: My experience in the area of technical product development and project management helps to set up effective development strategies and processes.

name: Problem Solver
text: Solving problems with code and process automation is what fascinates me most about software development. Credo: there's always a solution!

name: Project Management
text: Successful development processes require proper team processes, management and communication. In case you need additional CTO-like support, I'm there.
